translated: and having bowed to the nature of time,

original: gti mug mun pa gzhig pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gti mug mun pa gzhig pa'i phyir //
translated: in order to destroy the darkness of delusion,

original: de yi sgron me rab gsal bya //

analyzed: rab byung la sogs pa'i lo drug cu rdzogs pan dhr'u ba ka gzhan gsungs pa'i phyir ro //

original: de bzhin du lnga brgya brgyad cu rtsa gsum du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du lnga brgya brgyad cu rtsa gsum du 'gyur ro //
translated: Similarly, it becomes five hundred and eighty-three.

original: de ltar lo drug cu rdzogs pa na drug cu drug cu 'jug pa'i phyir nges pa 'di ni mi rtag go zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar lo drug cu rdzogs pa na drug cu drug cu 'jug pa'i phyir nges pa 'di ni mi rtag go zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus, when sixty years are completed, sixty years are entered. Therefore, it should be understood that this certainty is impermanent.

original: de la yang lnga brgya dang nyi shu rtsa gsum gyi @242b nyid la da ltar gyi lo'i dhr'u ba ka'i don du rab byung la sogs pa'i lo gzhug par bya'o //

translated: Moreover, in the five hundred and twenty-three years, the years of the current Buddha Śākyamuni's renunciation and so forth should be inserted.

analyzed: rab byung la sogs pa'i lo drug cu rnams 'di ltar bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: The sixty years of renunciation and so forth should be established in the following way.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: sha ka dbang po'i 'das lo rnams //
analyzed: sha ka dbang po'i 'das lo rnams //
translated: The past years of Śāka Īśvara

original: drag pos bsgyur zhing yang bzhis bsgyur //
analyzed: drag pos bsgyur zhing yang bzhis bsgyur //

original: dgu brgyad bzhi dang ldan byas nas //
analyzed: dgu brgyad bzhi dang ldan byas nas //
translated: Having added nine hundred and eighty-four,

original: stod pa mda' ri 'dod pas bgo //
analyzed: stod pa mda' ri 'dod pas bgo //
translated: the upper part is desired to be subtracted.

original: rnyed pa sha ka'i lo bcas pa //
analyzed: rnyed pa sha ka'i lo bcas pa //
translated: The years of Śāka, together with the years of acquisition,

original: drug cus dag byas rab byung sogs //
analyzed: drug cus dag byas rab byung sogs //
translated: are divided by sixty, and the remainder is renunciation and so forth.

original: zhes pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: zhes pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: 'di yin nam brtag / sha ka zhes bya ba'i rgyal po 'das pa'i lo rnams bcu gcig gis bsgyur nas slar yang bzhis bsgyur bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di yin nam brtag / sha ka zhes bya ba'i rgyal po 'das pa'i lo rnams bcu gcig gis bsgyur nas slar yang bzhis bsgyur bar bya'o //
translated: The years of the king called Saka are multiplied by eleven and again divided by four.

original: dgu brgyad bzhi dang ldan byas nas //
analyzed: dgu brgyad bzhi dang ldan byas nas //
translated: Multiply by nine, eight, four.

original: zhes pa bzhi brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa dgu ldan par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa bzhi brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa dgu ldan par bya'o //
translated: That is, add four hundred and eighty-nine.

original: stong pa mda' ri 'bod pas bgo //🔽zhes pa khri sum stong bdun brgya lnga bcus bgos pa'i lhag ma phyis te rnyed pa dang lhan cig pa'i shaka'i lo drug bcus bgos pa'i lhag ma ni /
analyzed: stong pa mda' ri 'bod pas bgo // zhes pa khri sum stong bdun brgya lnga bcus bgos pa'i lhag ma phyis te rnyed pa dang lhan cig pa'i shaka'i lo drug bcus bgos pa'i lhag ma ni /
translated: Divide by one thousand, five hundred and twenty-five.🔽 That is, divide by fifteen thousand, three hundred and seventy-five.🔽The remainder is the Saka year together with the remainder of the division.

original: rab byung la sogs pa'i lor 'gyur ro //🔽rnyed pa ni rab byung la sogs pa'i lo drug cu rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas mi gzung ngo //
analyzed: rab byung la sogs pa'i lor 'gyur ro // rnyed pa ni rab byung la sogs pa'i lo drug cu rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas mi gzung ngo //
translated: The remainder of the division by sixty is the year of the ascetic, etc.🔽The remainder is not to be taken as the characteristic of the completion of sixty years of the ascetic, etc.

original: rab byung la sogs pa dang kla klo la sogs pa'i rim pas drug cu'i mthar thug pa'i rang rang gi ming ni rab tu grags pa dang gzhung mangs pa'i 'jigs pas ma bris so //
analyzed: rab byung la sogs pa dang kla klo la sogs pa'i rim pas drug cu'i mthar thug pa'i rang rang gi ming ni rab tu grags pa dang gzhung mangs pa'i 'jigs pas ma bris so //
translated: The names of the sixty years of the ascetic, etc., and the sixty years of the barbarian, etc., are well known, but for fear of prolixity I will not write them.

original: des na rab byung la sogs pa dang lhan cig lnga brgya dang nyi shu rtsa gsum ni kla klo'i lo ru rab tu grags so //
analyzed: des na rab byung la sogs pa dang lhan cig lnga brgya dang nyi shu rtsa gsum ni kla klo'i lo ru rab tu grags so //
translated: Therefore, the years of the barbarians are well known to be the years of the monks and so on, which are three hundred and twenty-two years less.

original: de la brgya brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyis dman pa'i lhag ma ni zla ba'i don du bcu gnyis kyis bsgyur bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la brgya brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyis dman pa'i lhag ma ni zla ba'i don du bcu gnyis kyis bsgyur bar bya'o //
translated: In this regard, the remainder, which is two hundred and eighty-eight years less, is converted into months by multiplying by twelve.

original: da ltar gyi zla ba'i don du nag pa la sogs pa'i zla ba ldan par bya ste de'i rim pa ni 'di yin no //
analyzed: da ltar gyi zla ba'i don du nag pa la sogs pa'i zla ba ldan par bya ste de'i rim pa ni 'di yin no //
translated: For the sake of the current month, the month of Kārtika and so on is added. Its order is as follows.

original: sa ga'i zla ba nas brtsams te gcig la sogs pa bcu gcig gi mthar thug pa gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: sa ga'i zla ba nas brtsams te gcig la sogs pa bcu gcig gi mthar thug pa gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Beginning from the month of Kārtika, one and so on up to eleven are inserted.

original: nag pa'i zla ba la ni lo ril po longs pas lo gcig bcug nas brtsi @243a * //
analyzed: nag pa'i zla ba la ni lo ril po longs pas lo gcig bcug nas brtsi @243a * //
translated: Since the month of Āṣāḍha is a complete year, one year is inserted and counted.

original: bar bya'o // zla ba'i tshogs 'di rnams kyang zla ba'i shol gzung pa'i phyir steng dang 'og gi ngo bos gnas gnyis su bya'o //
analyzed: bar bya'o // zla ba'i tshogs 'di rnams kyang zla ba'i shol gzung pa'i phyir steng dang 'og gi ngo bos gnas gnyis su bya'o //
translated: These collections of months are also for the sake of holding the intercalary month. They are to be placed in two locations by the method of the upper and lower faces.

original: 'dir nyi ma rgyu ba'i dbang gis zla ba phyed bcas sum cu rtsa gnyis rdzogs pa na shol gyi zla ba gcig 'byung bas na zla ba phyed bcas sum cu rtsa gnyis po bzhis bsgyur bas brgya sum cur gyur la /
analyzed: 'dir nyi ma rgyu ba'i dbang gis zla ba phyed bcas sum cu rtsa gnyis rdzogs pa na shol gyi zla ba gcig 'byung bas na zla ba phyed bcas sum cu rtsa gnyis po bzhis bsgyur bas brgya sum cur gyur la /
translated: Thus, thirty two and a half months multiplied by four is one hundred and thirty months.

original: yang na gnyis bsgyur bas drug cu rtsa lngar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang na gnyis bsgyur bas drug cu rtsa lngar 'gyur ro //
translated: Or, multiplied by two, it is sixty five months.

original: zla ba'i shol bde blag tu gzung ba'i phyir bzhi 'am gnyis kyis bsgyur ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis rgyu mtshan can bgo bya zla ba'i tshogs kyang bzhi 'am gnyis kyis bsgyur bas dag bar rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba'i shol bde blag tu gzung ba'i phyir bzhi 'am gnyis kyis bsgyur ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis rgyu mtshan can bgo bya zla ba'i tshogs kyang bzhi 'am gnyis kyis bsgyur bas dag bar rtogs par bya'o //
translated: In order to easily grasp the intercalary month, the reason for multiplying by four or two is that the group of months to be divided is multiplied by four or two.

original: rgyud dang 'grel pa ni mthun par bzhis bsgyur ba kho na'o zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyud dang 'grel pa ni mthun par bzhis bsgyur ba kho na'o zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the tantra and the commentary agree that it is multiplied by four.

original: de'i phyir zla ba'i tshogs la brgya sum cu kho nas sngar bshad pa'i rim pas sam yang na drug cu rtsa lngas bgos pas thob pa ni shol gyi zla ba'i bdag nyid de steng du zla ba'i tshogs la bcug ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir zla ba'i tshogs la brgya sum cu kho nas sngar bshad pa'i rim pas sam yang na drug cu rtsa lngas bgos pas thob pa ni shol gyi zla ba'i bdag nyid de steng du zla ba'i tshogs la bcug ste /
translated: Therefore, the number of months of delay is the remainder when the number of months is divided by 130, as explained previously, or 65.🔽

original: steng du zla ba'i tshogs zla ba dag pa'i bdag nyid bya'o //
analyzed: steng du zla ba'i tshogs zla ba dag pa'i bdag nyid bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the number of the lunar days is one hundred and thirty.

original: lhag ma ni ma rdzogs pa'i phyir mi gzung ngo //
analyzed: lhag ma ni ma rdzogs pa'i phyir mi gzung ngo //
translated: The remainder is not taken because it is incomplete.

original: gang gi tshe lhag ma cung zad kyang ma lus pa de'i tshe zla ba gnyis pa 'phel te zla ba re re'i 'phel ba /
analyzed: gang gi tshe lhag ma cung zad kyang ma lus pa de'i tshe zla ba gnyis pa 'phel te zla ba re re'i 'phel ba /
translated: When there is not even a little remainder, then the second lunar day increases.

original: zla ba ril po dang ldan pa zla ba gnyis 'phel ba la slar yang shol gyi zla ba gcig 'byung ngo zhes nges par bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba ril po dang ldan pa zla ba gnyis 'phel ba la slar yang shol gyi zla ba gcig 'byung ngo zhes nges par bya'o //
translated: The increase of each lunar day is one lunar day. The increase of two lunar days is again one lunar day of remainder.

original: de'i tshe zla ba gzhan zhig bcug ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe zla ba gzhan zhig bcug ste /
translated: At that time, another lunar day is added.

original: zla ba gnas gsum gyur pa zhes pa la sogs pa'i dh'u ba ka gsum la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba gnas gsum gyur pa zhes pa la sogs pa'i dh'u ba ka gsum la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The three positions of the moon and so forth should be established by the three dhruvaka and so forth.

original: yang na 'das pa'i zla ba dang yang dag par 'brel pa'i dh'u ba ka gsum la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin gza' la gza' gcig dang / gza'i chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ril po la ril po gnyis dang / ril po'i cha shas la gcig dang /
analyzed: yang na 'das pa'i zla ba dang yang dag par 'brel pa'i dh'u ba ka gsum la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin gza' la gza' gcig dang / gza'i chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ril po la ril po gnyis dang / ril po'i cha shas la gcig dang /
translated: Or, the three dhruvaka that are perfectly connected with the past month are, respectively, one planet for the planet, thirty-two ghaṭikās for the planet, two complete [months] for the complete [month], and one part of the complete [month] for the part of the complete [month].

original: skar ma la skar ma gnyis dang / chu tshod la chu tshod bcu gcig bcug ste /
analyzed: skar ma la skar ma gnyis dang / chu tshod la chu tshod bcu gcig bcug ste /
translated: Two stars for the star, and eleven ghaṭikās for the ghaṭikā are inserted.

original: shol gyi zla ba dang yang dag par 'brel pa'i dh'u ba ka gsum rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: shol gyi zla ba dang yang dag par 'brel pa'i dh'u ba ka gsum rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The three dhruvaka that are perfectly connected with the intercalary month should be understood.

original: zla ba gnyis 'phel ba'i zla ba ril po ni ma 'ongs pa'i zla ba dang yang dag par @243b 'brel par rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba gnyis 'phel ba'i zla ba ril po ni ma 'ongs pa'i zla ba dang yang dag par @243b 'brel par rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The complete month of the two increasing months should be understood as perfectly connected with the future month.

original: dag pa'i zla ba'i tshogs so //
analyzed: dag pa'i zla ba'i tshogs so //
translated: This concludes the collection of pure months.

original: da ni gza'i dhr'u ba ka brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni gza'i dhr'u ba ka brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the dhruvaka of the planets will be explained.

original: dag pa'i zla ba steng dang 'og gi ngo bos gnas gsum du bya ste /
analyzed: dag pa'i zla ba steng dang 'og gi ngo bos gnas gsum du bya ste /
translated: The pure month is placed in the three locations by the upper and lower faces.

original: steng ma gza'i bdag nyid dag gnas 'og ma chu tshod kyi bdag nyid dang / gnas par ma zla ba so so'i gza'i chu tshod kyi don te /
analyzed: steng ma gza'i bdag nyid dag gnas 'og ma chu tshod kyi bdag nyid dang / gnas par ma zla ba so so'i gza'i chu tshod kyi don te /
translated: The upper one is the nature of the nakṣatra, the lower one is the nature of the ghatis, and the remaining one is the meaning of the ghatis of the individual nakṣatras of the moon.

original: de rnams sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bsgyur nas 'og ma'i phung po lo drug gis bgos pas thob pa bu lon gyi bdag nyid yin pas chu tshod kyi dngos po las dbyi bar bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bsgyur nas 'og ma'i phung po lo drug gis bgos pas thob pa bu lon gyi bdag nyid yin pas chu tshod kyi dngos po las dbyi bar bya'o //
translated: Those are multiplied by thirty-two and divided by six years, the remainder is the nature of the debt, and it is subtracted from the ghatis.

original: bgos pa'i lhag ma drug cus bsgyur nas drug gis thob pa chu srang gi bdag nyid yin pas sngar gyi thob pa'i 'og tu bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: bgos pa'i lhag ma drug cus bsgyur nas drug gis thob pa chu srang gi bdag nyid yin pas sngar gyi thob pa'i 'og tu bri bar bya'o //
translated: The remainder is multiplied by sixty and divided by six, the result is the nature of the palas, and it is subtracted from the previous result.

original: lhag ma drug gis bsgyur nas drug gis bgos pas thob pa dbugs kyi bdag nyid yin pas de'i 'og tu gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma drug gis bsgyur nas drug gis bgos pas thob pa dbugs kyi bdag nyid yin pas de'i 'og tu gzhag par bya'o //
translated: The remainder is multiplied by six and divided by six, the result is the nature of the breaths, and it is placed below that.

original: chu srang gcig ni dbugs drug gi bdag nyid kyi phyir sgyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: chu srang gcig ni dbugs drug gi bdag nyid kyi phyir sgyang bar bya'o //
translated: Because one pala is the nature of six breaths, it is subtracted.

original: de nas steng dang 'og gi ngo bos gnas bzhir byas nas gza'i gnas kyi gza' ni chu tshod drug cu'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de nas steng dang 'og gi ngo bos gnas bzhir byas nas gza'i gnas kyi gza' ni chu tshod drug cu'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Then, having made the four places by the upper and lower faces, the planet in the place of the planet is of the nature of sixty hours.

original: chu tshod kyi gnas ni chu srang drug cu'i bdag nyid dang / chu srang gi gnas ni dbugs drug gi bdag nyid du gnas so //
analyzed: chu tshod kyi gnas ni chu srang drug cu'i bdag nyid dang / chu srang gi gnas ni dbugs drug gi bdag nyid du gnas so //
translated: The place of the hour is of the nature of sixty minutes, and the place of the minute is of the nature of six breaths.

original: des na dbugs drug tshang ba ni chu srang gcig gi bdag nyid du 'gyur ro //🔽chu srang drug cu tshang ba ni chu tshod gcig gi bdag nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na dbugs drug tshang ba ni chu srang gcig gi bdag nyid du 'gyur ro // chu srang drug cu tshang ba ni chu tshod gcig gi bdag nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the completion of six breaths is of the nature of one minute.🔽The completion of sixty minutes is of the nature of one hour.

original: chu tshod drug cu tshang ba ni gza' gcig gi bdag nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: chu tshod drug cu tshang ba ni gza' gcig gi bdag nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: The completion of sixty hours is of the nature of one planet.

original: de ltar thams cad du rtog par bya'o //🔽nges pa 'di ni nub par byed pa la 'ongs pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar thams cad du rtog par bya'o // nges pa 'di ni nub par byed pa la 'ongs pa ste /
translated: Thus, one should understand everything.

original: nyi ma la sogs pa 'char bar byed pa'i don du steng gi phung por gza' gnyis nor dang / 'og gi phung por chu tshod sum cu nor du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyi ma la sogs pa 'char bar byed pa'i don du steng gi phung por gza' gnyis nor dang / 'og gi phung por chu tshod sum cu nor du 'gyur ro //
translated: This certainty is for the setting of the sun and so forth, and for the rising of the sun and so forth, two planets are added to the upper heap and thirty hours are added to the lower heap.

original: chu tshod kyi phung po drug cu'i cha thob pa steng gi phung por bsres nas steng gi phung po'i bdun gyis bgos pa'i lhag ma ni gza' ru 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chu tshod kyi phung po drug cu'i cha thob pa steng gi phung por bsres nas steng gi phung po'i bdun gyis bgos pa'i lhag ma ni gza' ru 'gyur ro //
translated: The remainder of the quotient of the sum of the six groups of the ghatis added to the upper group, divided by seven, is the planet.

original: lhag ma gcig la sogs pa ni nyi ma la sogs pa rab tu grags pa rnams so //
analyzed: lhag ma gcig la sogs pa ni nyi ma la sogs pa rab tu grags pa rnams so //
translated: The remainder of one and so forth are the well-known sun and so forth.

original: rnyed pa ni gza' 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas mi gzung ngo //
analyzed: rnyed pa ni gza' 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas mi gzung ngo //
translated: Since the acquisition is the characteristic of the revolution of the planets, it is not taken.

original: da ni gza'i bdag nyid kyi ril po'i zla ba ka brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni gza'i bdag nyid kyi ril po'i zla ba ka brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the complete moon of the nature of the planets will be described.

analyzed: de la bcu bzhis bgos pa'i lhag ma gcig gam bcu gsum la zla ba'i rkang pa lngar shes par bya'o //

analyzed: de bzhin du gnyis sam bcu gnyis la bcu'o //

analyzed: lhag ma drug gis bsgyur te des bgos pas thob pa ni dbugs kyi tshogs te /
translated: The remainder is multiplied by six and divided, the result being the breaths.

original: de'i yang 'og tu gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i yang 'og tu gzhag par bya'o //
translated: That is also placed below the ghatis.

analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams la yang bkod pa de ltar shes par bya'o //
translated: This arrangement should be understood for the remaining [planets].

translated: When two remainders are left, the two [feet] are removed and the previous foot of the planet is understood together with it.

analyzed: ril po'i cha shas ni sngar bshad pa'i rigs pas de'i gnas 'og ma lngas bsgyur bar bya'o //
translated: The parts of the whole are multiplied by five below it in the same way as explained above.

analyzed: bcu bzhis bgos pa'i lhag ma gsum la ni gza'i rkang pa snga ma bcu dang lhan cig bco lnga'o //

analyzed: ril po'i cha shas ni snga ma bzhin de'i gnas 'og ma bzhis bsgyur bar bya'o //

analyzed: lhag ma bzhi la ni snga ma gsum dang lhan cig bcu dgu ste /
translated: The remainder of the four [signs] is nineteen together with the previous three [signs].

analyzed: ril po'i cha shas ni snga ma bzhin de'i gnas 'og ma gsum gyis bsgyur bar bya'o //
translated: The part of the whole is as before. It is multiplied by the three places below it.

analyzed: lhag ma lnga la ni snga ma bzhi dang lhan cig nyi shu rtsa gnyis te /

analyzed: ril po'i cha shas ni snga ma bzhin gnyis kyis bsgyur bar bya'o //
translated: The part of the whole is as before. It is multiplied by two.

analyzed: lhag ma brgyad la ni thams cad du rkang pa'i mtshon byed kyi mtshan ma phyis nas spyang zin pa'i rkang pa rnams dor te /

analyzed: rim pa la ni dbus kyi ri mo'i bar sbyang zin pa'i rkang pa'i gnas rnams gza'i rkang pa la bsres nas dgod par bya'o //
translated: In the forward order, the completed feet in the positions are added to the feet of the planet and set down.

original: khyad par ni ril po'i cha shas rim pas bgrod pa la spyang zin pa'i gza'i rkang pa'i gnas las 'og gi gza'i rkang pas bsgyur bar 'dod la /

analyzed: de la brgya nyi shu rtsa drug gis thob pa gza'i rkang pa dang ji ltar rigs par bsre bar bya'o //

analyzed: de brgya nyi shu rtsa drug gis bgos pas thob pa gza'i rkang pa ji ltar rigs par bu lon dbrog par bya'o //
translated: The part of the whole of the planet is obtained by dividing by 126. The part of the whole of the planet is subtracted from the part of the whole of the planet that is traversed.

original: lhag ma bcu gcig la ni ma spyad pa'i gnas gsum la gnas pa bco lnga'o//
analyzed: lhag ma bcu gcig la ni ma spyad pa'i gnas gsum la gnas pa bco lnga'o//

analyzed: lhag ma bcu gsum la ni ma spyang ba'i gnas gcig la gnas pa lnga'o //

analyzed: nyi ma'i rkang pa las byung ba ni phyogs 'di la yang thun mong du sbyin pa dang dor ba nyid de /

translated: The ghatis of the planets and the ghatis of the sun are equal and unequal, and the ghatis of the planets and the ghatis of the sun are added and subtracted.

original: gza'i rkang pa 'di rnams byis pa'i skye bo rnams kyis mthong bar bya ba'i phyir bris te /
analyzed: gza'i rkang pa 'di rnams byis pa'i skye bo rnams kyis mthong bar bya ba'i phyir bris te /
translated: These ghatis of the planets are written for the sake of being seen by childish beings.

original: gza' dang tshes dang skar ma dag pa'o //
analyzed: gza' dang tshes dang skar ma dag pa'o //
translated: The planets, lunar days, and stars are pure.

original: da ni nyi ma so so'i nyi ma dag pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni nyi ma so so'i nyi ma dag pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the purity of each day of the sun should be explained.

original: skar ma'i dhr'u ba ka la dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te nyi ma sum cu rnams su re re 'phel bas (tshes de/) bzhis bsgyur zhing de la gsum (tshes de'i/) gyi cha (chu srang nyi shu/) dag gis bsres te /

translated: Beginning from the first day of the bright fortnight of the star Dhrst, the days increase by one each day, multiplied by four, and divided by three.🔽On the first day, there are four hours and twenty water measures.🔽Here, since one water measure is missing, it is slightly less. In the case of Dhrst, it is divided by eleven.

translated: Since it is changed, there is no fault of omission.

analyzed: dpugs lnga dang 'dod cha brgyad kyis mdag pa'i cha yod do //
translated: There is also a part that is less by five breaths and eight finger lengths.

analyzed: ba de yang skar ma'i dhr'u ba ka la bcug ste /
translated: That is also placed in the Dhrst of the stars.

analyzed: nyi ma re re la 'phel ba de bzhin bya'o //
translated: The increase for each day should be done in the same way.

analyzed: yang na chu tshod bzhi dang chu srang nyi shu rtsa gnyis bcug ste 'di nyid dag go zhes bstan to //
translated: Or, four hours and twenty-two water measures are placed, and this is purified.

original: yang na grub pa'i mtha'i rigs pas chu tshod bzhi dang chu srang nyi shu rtsa drug dang dbugs gnyis te de yang ma dag pa'i nyi ma'i longs spyod kyi bdag nyid kyi dhr'u ba ka'o //
analyzed: yang na grub pa'i mtha'i rigs pas chu tshod bzhi dang chu srang nyi shu rtsa drug dang dbugs gnyis te de yang ma dag pa'i nyi ma'i longs spyod kyi bdag nyid kyi dhr'u ba ka'o //
translated: Or else, by the reasoning of the philosophical schools, it is four hours, thirty-six minutes, and two breaths, and that is the dharvā of the sun, which is the essence of the enjoyment of the impure sun.

original: snga ma dang phyi ma'i ngo bos gnas gsum du bzhag nas gcig la khyim gsum gyi bdag nyid 'di gza' lnga la mkho ba'i nyin zhag gi nyi dag bsgrub tshul lo //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma'i ngo bos gnas gsum du bzhag nas gcig la khyim gsum gyi bdag nyid 'di gza' lnga la mkho ba'i nyin zhag gi nyi dag bsgrub tshul lo //
translated: Having established the three places by the nature of the former and the latter, this [dharvā] is the method of calculating the solar days required for the five planets, which have the nature of three houses in one.

original: rgyu skar drug dang chu tshod bzhi bcu rtsa lnga dbyi bar bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu skar drug dang chu tshod bzhi bcu rtsa lnga dbyi bar bya'o //

analyzed: de ltar na lug la sogs pa'i khyim gsum sbyangs pa'i phyir nyi ma skyes pa'i khyim karka tar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, for the purification of the three houses of Aries and so forth, the house where the sun is born becomes Cancer.

analyzed: bya ba lhag ma ni gza' bkra shis kyi ji lta ba bzhin du nyi ma la yang shes par bya'o //
translated: The remaining actions should be understood for the sun as they are for the planet Bṛhaspati.

original: 'on kyang bkra shis dang gza'i rkang pa rnams tha dad de nyi ma'i gza'i rkang pa rnams ni drug dang bzhi dang gcig ste dang po karka ta la drug go //

original: gnyis pa seng ge la bzhi'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa seng ge la bzhi'o //

original: gsum pa bu mo la gcig go //
analyzed: gsum pa bu mo la gcig go //

analyzed: de nas lugs las bzlog pas bzhi pa srang la gcig go //

original: lnga pa sdig pa la bzhi'o //
analyzed: lnga pa sdig pa la bzhi'o //
translated: In Scorpio, there are four.

original: drug pa gzhu la drug go //
analyzed: drug pa gzhu la drug go //

analyzed: chu srin la sogs pa la yang de lta bu nyid du rtogs par bya'o //

analyzed: de la rkang pa'i gnas su shar ba gang yin pa de'i rkang pa'i gnas kyi de ma thag pas lhag ma rnams bsgyur te /

analyzed: chu tshod kyi gnas la sogs par nor dang bu lon du bya ste /
translated: In the place of the hours and so on, it is to be done as profit and loss.

analyzed: de yang chu srin la sogs pa la nor dang karka ta la sogs pa la bu lon no zhes pa mdor bsdus pa ste /

analyzed: rgyu skar gyi dhr'u ba ka la yang rgyu skar gcig byin te /

analyzed: de nas yang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bgrod de /

original: de nas gzhan gyi bu lon sbyangs te lhag ma'i chu tshod la sogs pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas gzhan gyi bu lon sbyangs te lhag ma'i chu tshod la sogs pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having paid the other’s debt, the remaining hours and so on are to be written.

original: gang gi tshe yang rtsis kyi dbang gis sbyangs pa'i lhag ma'i chu tshod drug cu lhag par gyur pa de'i tshe rgyu skar gyi chu tshod 'phel lo zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe yang rtsis kyi dbang gis sbyangs pa'i lhag ma'i chu tshod drug cu lhag par gyur pa de'i tshe rgyu skar gyi chu tshod 'phel lo zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: When, by the power of calculation, the remaining hours are more than sixty, then the lunar mansion hours increase.

original: de'i tshe yang 'das pa'i rgyu skar las gzhan pa'i chu tshod drug cu bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang 'das pa'i rgyu skar las gzhan pa'i chu tshod drug cu bri bar bya'o //
translated: At that time, sixty hours other than the past lunar mansion should be subtracted.

original: lhag pa'i chu tshod ni ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu skar las gzhan du bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: lhag pa'i chu tshod ni ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu skar las gzhan du bri bar bya'o //
translated: The remaining hours should be subtracted from the future lunar mansion.

original: ji srid rtsis kyi dbang gis lhag pa dang chad pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: ji srid rtsis kyi dbang gis lhag pa dang chad pa'i bar du'o //
translated: This continues as long as there is a remainder or a deficiency by the power of calculation.

original: chad na ni de'i rim pa ji lta ba kho na'o //🔽gang gi tshe lhag pa dang bcas pas chu tshod drug cu'i mthar thug par 'phel ba de'i tshe rgyu skar gcig 'phel lo zhes rig par bya ste /
analyzed: chad na ni de'i rim pa ji lta ba kho na'o // gang gi tshe lhag pa dang bcas pas chu tshod drug cu'i mthar thug par 'phel ba de'i tshe rgyu skar gcig 'phel lo zhes rig par bya ste /
translated: If there is a deficiency, it is just as the sequence is.🔽When, with the remainder, the sixty hours increase to the end, then one lunar mansion increases.

original: de'i tshe yang ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu skar la chu tshod drug cu bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu skar la chu tshod drug cu bri bar bya'o //
translated: At that time, sixty hours should be subtracted from the future lunar mansion.

original: ji srid rim pa yongs su dman pas chad pa de dang de la go rims ji lta ba nyid do //
analyzed: ji srid rim pa yongs su dman pas chad pa de dang de la go rims ji lta ba nyid do //
translated: As long as the level is completely inferior, it is just as the order.

original: da ni sol ba la sogs pa sbyor ba nyi shu rtsa bdun gsal bar bya ste /
analyzed: da ni sol ba la sogs pa sbyor ba nyi shu rtsa bdun gsal bar bya ste /
translated: Now, the application of charcoal, etc. should be clarified.

original: rgyu skar gyi dhr'u ba ka la gnas pa'i rgyu skar rnams kyi mtshan ma dang zla bas spyad pa'i rgyu skar rnams bsres par gyur ba la nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis sbyangs pa'i lhag ma ni sel ba la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rgyu skar gyi dhr'u ba ka la gnas pa'i rgyu skar rnams kyi mtshan ma dang zla bas spyad pa'i rgyu skar rnams bsres par gyur ba la nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis sbyangs pa'i lhag ma ni sel ba la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The signs of the lunar mansions that are located in the lunar mansion Dhruba, and the lunar mansions that are traversed by the moon, are mixed. The remainder when divided by twenty-seven is the eliminator, etc.

original: da ni gdab pa la sogs pa'i byed pa bdun brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni gdab pa la sogs pa'i byed pa bdun brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the seven operations of throwing, etc. should be stated.

original: dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa nas gnam stong gi mthar thug pa tshes sum cu po re re bzhin 'phel ba gnyis kyis bsgyur te /
analyzed: dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa nas gnam stong gi mthar thug pa tshes sum cu po re re bzhin 'phel ba gnyis kyis bsgyur te /
translated: From the first day of the bright fortnight, up to the thirtieth day, each day is multiplied by two.

original: gcig dang bral ba la bdun gyis bgos pa'i lhag ma ni gdab pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gcig dang bral ba la bdun gyis bgos pa'i lhag ma ni gdab pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The remainder when subtracted by one and divided by seven is the throw, etc.

original: bdun gyis bgor ma btub pa la mtshan ma gcig dang bral ba yang gdab pa la sogs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdun gyis bgor ma btub pa la mtshan ma gcig dang bral ba yang gdab pa la sogs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it cannot be divided by seven, then one should add one sign, and so on.

original: de ltar na gza' dang tshes dang skar ma dang sbyor ba dang byed pa yan lag lnga po rnams te /
analyzed: de ltar na gza' dang tshes dang skar ma dang sbyor ba dang byed pa yan lag lnga po rnams te /
translated: Thus, the five limbs are the planets, the lunar days, the stars, the conjunctions, and the activities.

original: gza' ni nyi ma la sogs pa rab tu grags pa bdun no //🔽tshes ni @248a * //
analyzed: gza' ni nyi ma la sogs pa rab tu grags pa bdun no // tshes ni @248a * //
translated: The planets are the seven well-known ones beginning with the sun.

original: dkar po dang nag po'i phyogs bco lnga bco lngar rab tu grags pa rnams so //
analyzed: dkar po dang nag po'i phyogs bco lnga bco lngar rab tu grags pa rnams so //
translated: The lunar days are the fifteen well-known ones of the bright and dark fortnights.

original: rgyu skar ni tha skar la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bdun rab tu grags pa rnams so //
analyzed: rgyu skar ni tha skar la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bdun rab tu grags pa rnams so //
translated: The stars are the twenty-seven well-known ones beginning with Āśleṣā.

original: sbyor ba yang sel ba la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bdun nyid do //
analyzed: sbyor ba yang sel ba la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bdun nyid do //
translated: The conjunctions are also the twenty-seven beginning with Śravaṇa.

original: byed pa ni gdab ba la sogs pa bdun te /🔽dkar po'i tshes gcig gi phyed phyi ma la gdab pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa ni gdab ba la sogs pa bdun te / dkar po'i tshes gcig gi phyed phyi ma la gdab pa'o //
translated: The activities are the seven beginning with sowing.🔽On the second half of the first day of the bright fortnight, one should sow.

original: gnyis kyi phyed snga ma la byis pa can no //
analyzed: gnyis kyi phyed snga ma la byis pa can no //
translated: On the first half of the second day, one should plow.

original: phyed phyi ma la rigs can no //
analyzed: phyed phyi ma la rigs can no //
translated: On the second half, one should yoke.

original: gsum gyi phyed snga ma la til brdung ngo //
analyzed: gsum gyi phyed snga ma la til brdung ngo //
translated: On the first half of the third day, one should pound sesame seeds.

original: phyed phyi ma la khyim skyes so //
analyzed: phyed phyi ma la khyim skyes so //
translated: The second half is for the householder.

original: bzhi'i phyed snga ma la tshong ba'o//
analyzed: bzhi'i phyed snga ma la tshong ba'o//
translated: The first half of the four is for the merchant.

original: phyed phyi ma la bishti'o //
analyzed: phyed phyi ma la bishti'o //
translated: The second half is for the Viṣṭi.

original: de bzhin du nag po'i bcu bzhi'i phyed snga ma la bishti'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du nag po'i bcu bzhi'i phyed snga ma la bishti'o //
translated: Similarly, the first half of the dark fourteenth is for the Viṣṭi.

original: phyed phyi ma la bkra shis so //
analyzed: phyed phyi ma la bkra shis so //
translated: The second half is for the auspicious.

original: gnam stong gi phyed snga ma la rkang bzhi'o //
analyzed: gnam stong gi phyed snga ma la rkang bzhi'o //
translated: The first half of the new moon is for the quadruped.

original: phyed phyi ma la klu'o //
analyzed: phyed phyi ma la klu'o //
translated: The second half is for the Nāga.

original: dkar po'i tshes gcig gi phyed snga ma la mi sdug pa'o //
analyzed: dkar po'i tshes gcig gi phyed snga ma la mi sdug pa'o //
translated: The first half of the white first is for the ugly.

original: phyed phyi ma la slar yang gdab pa'o ;
analyzed: phyed phyi ma la slar yang gdab pa'o ;
translated: The second half is for the throwing again.

original: / de ltar na byed pa bcu gcig ste yan lag lnga'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: / de ltar na byed pa bcu gcig ste yan lag lnga'i rim pa'o //
translated: Thus there are eleven activities, the order of the five limbs.

original: skar ma tha skar la sogs pa'i rkang pa dgu dgu ni lug la sogs pa'i khyim rab tu grags pa bcu gnyis po rnams so //
analyzed: skar ma tha skar la sogs pa'i rkang pa dgu dgu ni lug la sogs pa'i khyim rab tu grags pa bcu gnyis po rnams so //
translated: The nine feet of the stars Aśvinī and so on are the twelve houses of Aries and so on, which are well known.

original: 'di rnams la rim pa bzhin du mig dmar dang lug / pa sangs dang glang /
analyzed: 'di rnams la rim pa bzhin du mig dmar dang lug / pa sangs dang glang /
translated: In these, the order is as follows: Mars and Aries, Venus and Taurus,

original: gza' ('khrig pa/) lhag dang / zla ba dang / (karka ta/) nyi ma dang / (seng ge) / gza' (bu mo/) lhag dang / pa ba sangs dang / srang /🔽mig dmar dang / sdig pa /🔽phur bu dang / gzhu /
analyzed: gza' ('khrig pa/) lhag dang / zla ba dang / (karka ta/) nyi ma dang / (seng ge) / gza' (bu mo/) lhag dang / pa ba sangs dang / srang / mig dmar dang / sdig pa / phur bu dang / gzhu /
translated: [The signs] Taurus, Virgo, Scorpio, and Capricorn are the houses of the sun.

original: spen pa dang / chu srin /🔽spen pa dang / bum pa /
analyzed: spen pa dang / chu srin / spen pa dang / bum pa /
translated: [The signs] Cancer, Pisces, and Sagittarius are the houses of Jupiter.🔽[The signs] Aries, Libra, and Aquarius are the houses of Venus.🔽[The signs] Taurus, Virgo, and Capricorn are the houses of Mercury.

original: lug dang sdig ba'i mig dmar zhing //🔽glang dang srang ni pa sangs zhing//
analyzed: lug dang sdig ba'i mig dmar zhing // glang dang srang ni pa sangs zhing//
translated: [The signs] Aries and Scorpio are the houses of Mars.🔽[The signs] Taurus and Libra are the houses of Venus.

original: 'khrig pa bu mo gza' lhag zhing //
analyzed: 'khrig pa bu mo gza' lhag zhing //
translated: [The signs] Gemini and Aquarius are the houses of Mercury.

original: zla ba'i zhing ni karka ta //🔽nyi ma'i zhing ni seng ge'i khyim //🔽phur bu'i zhing ni gzhu dang nya //
analyzed: zla ba'i zhing ni karka ta // nyi ma'i zhing ni seng ge'i khyim // phur bu'i zhing ni gzhu dang nya //
translated: [The sign] Cancer is the house of the moon.🔽[The sign] Leo is the house of the sun.🔽[The sign] Sagittarius is the house of Jupiter.

original: chu srin bum pa'i zhing bdag ldan //
analyzed: chu srin bum pa'i zhing bdag ldan //
translated: [The signs] Pisces and Aquarius are the houses of Saturn.

original: de ltar gza' bdun khyim la dbang //
analyzed: de ltar gza' bdun khyim la dbang //
translated: Thus the seven planets rule the houses.

original: phur bu rnams ni zhing can no //
analyzed: phur bu rnams ni zhing can no //
translated: [The signs] Aries and Scorpio are the houses of Mars.

original: da ni lo 'pho ba'i dh'u ba ka brjod pa ra bya ste /
analyzed: da ni lo 'pho ba'i dh'u ba ka brjod pa ra bya ste /
translated: Now, I will explain the Dhuvakas of the transits of the year.

original: dag pa'i lo la brgyad bsres te bzhi brgyas bsgyur nas brgyad bsres pa'i byed pa'i los dman par byas pa sum brgya bcu bdun gyis bgos pa'i lhag ma ni gzar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dag pa'i lo la brgyad bsres te bzhi brgyas bsgyur nas brgyad bsres pa'i byed pa'i los dman par byas pa sum brgya bcu bdun gyis bgos pa'i lhag ma ni gzar 'gyur ro //
translated: The remainder is the oblique motion.

original: bgos pa'i lhag ma chu tshod kyi don du drug cus bsgyur te sngar bshad (sum brgya bcu bdun/) pa nyid kyis bgos pas thob pa ni chu tshod du 'gyur @248b ro ;
analyzed: bgos pa'i lhag ma chu tshod kyi don du drug cus bsgyur te sngar bshad (sum brgya bcu bdun/) pa nyid kyis bgos pas thob pa ni chu tshod du 'gyur @248b ro ;
translated: The remainder of the division is multiplied by sixty for the purpose of the ghatis and divided by the previously explained [number of] ghatis. The result is the ghatis.

original: / de la bkra shis la sogs pa'i nges pa nyi ma la sogs pas byed pa'i don du gza'i gnas su gnyis dang chu tshod kyi gnas su sum cu sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: / de la bkra shis la sogs pa'i nges pa nyi ma la sogs pas byed pa'i don du gza'i gnas su gnyis dang chu tshod kyi gnas su sum cu sbyin par bya'o //
translated: For the purpose of determining the auspiciousness, etc., of the sun and so forth, two [degrees] are to be added to the sign of the planet and thirty to the sign of the ghati.

original: drug cus bgos pas thob pa ni gzar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: drug cus bgos pas thob pa ni gzar 'gyur ro //
translated: The result of dividing by sixty is the planet.

original: bdun gyis bgos pa'i lhag ma ni gza'i gnas su gza' ste lo 'pho ba'i zla ba la 'gyur ro zhes pa rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bdun gyis bgos pa'i lhag ma ni gza'i gnas su gza' ste lo 'pho ba'i zla ba la 'gyur ro zhes pa rig par bya'o //
translated: The remainder of the division by seven is the sign of the planet, which is the month of the revolution of the year. This should be understood.

original: da ni lug la sogs pa'i 'pho bar snon pa la snon byed bcu gnyis kyis lo'i dhr'u ba ka brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni lug la sogs pa'i 'pho bar snon pa la snon byed bcu gnyis kyis lo'i dhr'u ba ka brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the addition of the twelve addenda to the ascendant of Aries, etc., is to be stated.

original: lug dang glang dang 'khrig pa dang karka ta dang seng ge dang bu mo rnams la gza'i gnas su gcig dang chu tshod kyi gnas su lnga bcu rtsa bdun no //
analyzed: lug dang glang dang 'khrig pa dang karka ta dang seng ge dang bu mo rnams la gza'i gnas su gcig dang chu tshod kyi gnas su lnga bcu rtsa bdun no //
translated: Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, and Virgo have one in the place of the planet and fifty-seven in the place of the hour.

original: de la gza'i gnas su lo'i dhr'u ba ka dang lhan cig bsnan pas gzar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gza'i gnas su lo'i dhr'u ba ka dang lhan cig bsnan pas gzar 'gyur ro //
translated: There, by adding to the place of the planet together with the Dhurvakas of the year, there is the planet.

original: gza' des lug gi 'pho ba'o //
analyzed: gza' des lug gi 'pho ba'o //
translated: That planet is the ascendant of Aries.🔽Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius, and Pisces have space in the place of the planet and fifty-two in the place of the hour.

original: srang dang sdig pa dang gzhu dang chu srin dang bum pa dang (rim pas 'gyur ba las thog ma lug la) nya rnams (rim pas 'gyur ba las mthar nya la/) la gza'i gnas su nam mkha' dang chu tshod kyi gnas su chu tshod (lnga bcu rtsa gnyis/) de
analyzed: srang dang sdig pa dang gzhu dang chu srin dang bum pa dang (rim pas 'gyur ba las thog ma lug la) nya rnams (rim pas 'gyur ba las mthar nya la/) la gza'i gnas su nam mkha' dang chu tshod kyi gnas su chu tshod (lnga bcu rtsa gnyis/) de
translated: By those, there are two hours.

original: rnams kyis chu tshod do zhes pa thams cad du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rnams kyis chu tshod do zhes pa thams cad du rig par bya'o //
translated: All of this should be understood.

original: gza' la bzhi dang chu tshod du lnga bcu rtsa gsum ni glang la'o //
analyzed: gza' la bzhi dang chu tshod du lnga bcu rtsa gsum ni glang la'o //
translated: Four days and fifty-three hours are in Vṛṣa.

original: 'khrig pa la gza' gcig dang chu tshod bcu bdun no //
analyzed: 'khrig pa la gza' gcig dang chu tshod bcu bdun no //
translated: One day and seventeen hours are in Mithuna.

original: karka ta la gza' bzhi dang chu tshod lnga bcu rtsa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis /
analyzed: karka ta la gza' bzhi dang chu tshod lnga bcu rtsa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis /
translated: Four days and fifty-two hours are in Karkaṭaka.

original: gsum mo // seng ge la gza' gcig dang chu tshod nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: gsum mo // seng ge la gza' gcig dang chu tshod nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: One day and twenty-two hours are in Siṃha.

original: bu mo la gza' bzhi dang chu tshod nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: bu mo la gza' bzhi dang chu tshod nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: Four days and twenty-four hours are in Kanyā.

original: srang la gza' drug dang chu tshod lnga bcu rtsa gcig go //
analyzed: srang la gza' drug dang chu tshod lnga bcu rtsa gcig go //
translated: Six days and fifty-one hours are in Tula.

original: sdig pa la gza' gcig dang chu tshod bzhi bcu rtsa bdun no //
analyzed: sdig pa la gza' gcig dang chu tshod bzhi bcu rtsa bdun no //
translated: One day and forty-seven hours are in Vṛścika.

original: gzhu la gza' gsum dang chu tshod bcu drug go //
analyzed: gzhu la gza' gsum dang chu tshod bcu drug go //
translated: Three days and sixteen hours are in Dhanus.

original: chu srin la gza' bzhi dang chu tshod sum cu rtsa bdun no //
analyzed: chu srin la gza' bzhi dang chu tshod sum cu rtsa bdun no //
translated: Four days and thirty-seven hours are in Makara.

original: bum pa la gza' drug dang chu tshod bzhi bcu'o //
analyzed: bum pa la gza' drug dang chu tshod bzhi bcu'o //
translated: Six days and forty hours are in Kumbha.🔽One day and fifty-two hours are in Mina.

original: nya la gza' stong pa dang chu tshod lnga bcu rtsa gnyis te 'pho ba'i tshul gyis byed pa shes par bya'o //
analyzed: nya la gza' stong pa dang chu tshod lnga bcu rtsa gnyis te 'pho ba'i tshul gyis byed pa shes par bya'o //
translated: The way to understand the movement of the planets should be known.

original: grub pa'i mtha' la yang 'di 'pho ba'i longs spyod du mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' la yang 'di 'pho ba'i longs spyod du mi 'gyur te //
translated: Also, this is not a transference of the enjoyment of the culmination of attainment.

original: 'on kyang sngar bshad pa'i cho gas chu tshod bzhi dang chu srang nyi shu rtsa gnyis nyi ma so sor gcig la sogs pa 'phel ba skar ma'i dhr'u ba ka la sbyin nas nyi ma'i gnas su @249a * //
analyzed: 'on kyang sngar bshad pa'i cho gas chu tshod bzhi dang chu srang nyi shu rtsa gnyis nyi ma so sor gcig la sogs pa 'phel ba skar ma'i dhr'u ba ka la sbyin nas nyi ma'i gnas su @249a * //
translated: However, by the method explained previously, having given the lunar day, etc., to the Dhurta of the stars, increasing by one day, etc., for twenty-two ghaṭikās, one should ascertain that there is a pure transference of the sun.

original: 'pho ba dag pa yod do zhes nges par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni rig pa'o //
analyzed: 'pho ba dag pa yod do zhes nges par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni rig pa'o //
translated: This is the knowledge.

original: lo'i dhr'u ba ka gcig pu 'di nag pa la sogs pa nas brtsams te lo gzhan la yang lo gzhan gcig bcug ste dhr'u ba ka gzhan gang yin pa de yis 'pho ba nges pa'o //
analyzed: lo'i dhr'u ba ka gcig pu 'di nag pa la sogs pa nas brtsams te lo gzhan la yang lo gzhan gcig bcug ste dhr'u ba ka gzhan gang yin pa de yis 'pho ba nges pa'o //
translated: This one Dhurta of the year, beginning from the month of Āṣāḍha, is inserted into another year, and by whatever other Dhurta, the transference is ascertained.

original: yang na byang du bgrod pa'i zla ba dang po la nyi ma bcu'i bar du brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: yang na byang du bgrod pa'i zla ba dang po la nyi ma bcu'i bar du brtag par bya ste /
translated: Or, one should investigate for ten days in the first month of the northern course.

original: phur bu'i grib ma gang las phur bu'i grib ma 'jug pa nas brtsams te nyi ma byang du 'pho ba'i nyin mo'i nyi ma de'i gza' dang / de'i tshes dang de'i sbyor ba dang de'i byed pas so //
analyzed: phur bu'i grib ma gang las phur bu'i grib ma 'jug pa nas brtsams te nyi ma byang du 'pho ba'i nyin mo'i nyi ma de'i gza' dang / de'i tshes dang de'i sbyor ba dang de'i byed pas so //
translated: Beginning from the shadow of the gnomon where the shadow of the gnomon enters, the day of the sun, the lunar day, the yoga, and the karaṇa of that day of the sun at the time of the northern declination of the sun.

original: de la nyin mo'i nyi ma'i longs spyod la rgyu skar gyi gnas su nyi shu dang chu tshod kyi gnas su bco lnga'i zhes rtsa ba'i dhr'u ba ka'o //
analyzed: de la nyin mo'i nyi ma'i longs spyod la rgyu skar gyi gnas su nyi shu dang chu tshod kyi gnas su bco lnga'i zhes rtsa ba'i dhr'u ba ka'o //
translated: There, in the enjoyment of the day of the sun, twenty in the place of the lunar mansions and fifteen in the place of the hours, is the basic dhruvaka.

original: dhr'u ba ka de la nyin re bzhin nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyin zhag gis thob pa bcug ste /
analyzed: dhr'u ba ka de la nyin re bzhin nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyin zhag gis thob pa bcug ste /
translated: In that dhruvaka, the orb of the sun is inserted every day by the solar days.

original: de nas sngar bshad pa'i cho gas nyi ma'i rkang pa rnams sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sngar bshad pa'i cho gas nyi ma'i rkang pa rnams sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: Then, by the method explained previously, the solar feet should be extracted.

original: da ni nyin zhag gi dkyil 'khor bgrod pa'i tshad brjod par bya ste /

original: de ltar na gzhu'i khyim du skyes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na gzhu'i khyim du skyes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, it is born in the house of Sagittarius.

original: dal ba'i gza'i rkang pa rnams ni nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang bco lnga dang drug dang / rtsa ba drug dang bco lnga dang nyi shu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur te /
analyzed: dal ba'i gza'i rkang pa rnams ni nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang bco lnga dang drug dang / rtsa ba drug dang bco lnga dang nyi shu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur te /
translated: The feet of the slow planet are twenty-two, fifteen, six, six, fifteen, and twenty-two.

original: thams cad du lugs las bzlog pa nyid du rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad du lugs las bzlog pa nyid du rtogs par bya'o //
translated: In all cases, they should be understood in reverse order.

original: myur ba'i gza'i rkang pa rnams ni drug dang lnga dang lnga dang bzhi dang / bzhi dang gnyis dang / gnyis dang stong pa dang rtsa ba'i ri mo las pha rol tu gnyis dang bzhi dang lnga dang drug dang brgyad dang gsum rnams so //
analyzed: myur ba'i gza'i rkang pa rnams ni drug dang lnga dang lnga dang bzhi dang / bzhi dang gnyis dang / gnyis dang stong pa dang rtsa ba'i ri mo las pha rol tu gnyis dang bzhi dang lnga dang drug dang brgyad dang gsum rnams so //
translated: The feet of the fast planet are six, five, five, four, four, two, two, zero, and beyond the basic line, two, four, five, six, eight, and three.

original: de ltar na bkra shis la sogs pa gza' lnga po rnams kyi dag pa bshad zin to //
analyzed: de ltar na bkra shis la sogs pa gza' lnga po rnams kyi dag pa bshad zin to //
translated: Thus, the purities of the five planets, beginning with Bṛhaspati, have been explained.

original: bkra shis la sogs pa'i gza' lnga po rnams kyis dal ba dang myur ba'i las kho nas don thams cad dag pas na gnyis ka ji ltar dag pa bshad zin to //
analyzed: bkra shis la sogs pa'i gza' lnga po rnams kyis dal ba dang myur ba'i las kho nas don thams cad dag pas na gnyis ka ji ltar dag pa bshad zin to //
translated: Since all matters are purified by the slow and fast actions of the five planets, beginning with Bṛhaspati, both have been explained.

original: da ni rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now the characteristics of the moving [planets] should be stated.

original: 'dir gza' lnga po rnams dang gza' gnyis po'i dal ba dang myur ba la yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las 'char ba lnga po rnams rim pas bgrod pa myur bar rgyu ba zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir gza' lnga po rnams dang gza' gnyis po'i dal ba dang myur ba la yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las 'char ba lnga po rnams rim pas bgrod pa myur bar rgyu ba zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Here, the five planets and the two [loṇas] are said to move quickly when they move through the five ascents from the orb of the sun in order.

original: rkang pa'i gnas kyi longs spyod ni rtsa ba'i ri mo mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: rkang pa'i gnas kyi longs spyod ni rtsa ba'i ri mo mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The enjoyment of the foot-places is the final line.

original: dal bar rgyu ba ni 'khyog por bgrod pa la /
analyzed: dal bar rgyu ba ni 'khyog por bgrod pa la /
translated: Moving slowly is moving in a crooked way.

original: kha nub tu phyogs te bgrod par byed de /
analyzed: kha nub tu phyogs te bgrod par byed de /
translated: One should move facing west.

original: gza'i rkang pa ni rtsa ba'i ri mo brgal nas bgrod de //
analyzed: gza'i rkang pa ni rtsa ba'i ri mo brgal nas bgrod de //
translated: The foot of a planet moves beyond the line.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rim pa la nor dang 'khor lo phyed dor ba rim min la bu lon no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rim pa la nor dang 'khor lo phyed dor ba rim min la bu lon no //
translated: For that very reason, in order, subtract one-half of the wheel from the wealth, and in disorder, subtract the debt.

original: des na rim pas bgrod pa la myur ba'i gza' zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: des na rim pas bgrod pa la myur ba'i gza' zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should say that the planets moving in order are quick planets.

original: rim min la ni dal ba'i gza' ste /
analyzed: rim min la ni dal ba'i gza' ste /
translated: In disorder, they are slow planets.

original: 'khyog po'i gza' zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'khyog po'i gza' zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: They should be called crooked planets.

original: gang gi tshe nyi ma'i g-yas su bgrod pa de'i tshe g-yas kyi gza' dang g-yon du ni g-yon du ni g-yon gyi gza' zhes brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe nyi ma'i g-yas su bgrod pa de'i tshe g-yas kyi gza' dang g-yon du ni g-yon du ni g-yon gyi gza' zhes brjod par bya ste /
translated: When it moves to the right of the sun, then the planets to the right are said to be strong, and to the left, the planets to the left.

original: nyi ma'i 'od dang nye bar gyur pas mi snang ba de'i tshe nub pa zhes brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od dang nye bar gyur pas mi snang ba de'i tshe nub pa zhes brjod par bya ste /
translated: When they are close to the light of the sun, they are not visible, and then they are said to be setting.🔽Jupiter and Venus are strong when the planets move quickly.

original: gza' lhag dang phur bu ni myur ba'i gza' la stobs dang ldan (mig dmar phur bu g-yas kyi gza' //🔽lhag pa mjug rings g-yon gyi gza')par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gza' lhag dang phur bu ni myur ba'i gza' la stobs dang ldan (mig dmar phur bu g-yas kyi gza' // lhag pa mjug rings g-yon gyi gza')par 'gyur ro //
translated: Mars and Mercury are strong when the planets move slowly.

original: sa skyes dang mjug rings ni 'khyog po la stobs dang ldan no //
analyzed: sa skyes dang mjug rings ni 'khyog po la stobs dang ldan no //
translated: Rahu and Ketu are strong when the planets move crookedly.

original: dal ba la pa sangs ni 'khyog po'i gza' nyid do //🔽myur ba la gza' thams cad gdong @253a * //
analyzed: dal ba la pa sangs ni 'khyog po'i gza' nyid do // myur ba la gza' thams cad gdong @253a * //
translated: Saturn is a crooked planet when it moves slowly.

original: shar du blta'o //
analyzed: shar du blta'o //
translated: When the planets move quickly, they face east.

original: 'khyog po la nub tu blta'o //
analyzed: 'khyog po la nub tu blta'o //
translated: When they move crookedly, they face west.

original: da ni mjug rings dag pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni mjug rings dag pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the motion of Ketu will be described.

original: mjug rings kyi rgyu ba zla ba gsum cu rtsa drug dang chu tshod bzhi bcu rtsa lnga ste /
analyzed: mjug rings kyi rgyu ba zla ba gsum cu rtsa drug dang chu tshod bzhi bcu rtsa lnga ste /
translated: The motion of Ketu is thirty-six months and forty-five hours.

original: nyin zhag so sor chu srang gnyis dang dbugs gsum mo //
analyzed: nyin zhag so sor chu srang gnyis dang dbugs gsum mo //
translated: Two minutes and three breaths for each day.

original: 'on kyang zla ba phyed nyi ma'i mdun du rgyu ba na rim par rgyu ba dang zla ba phyed nyi ma'i rgyab tu ni 'khyog po'i gza'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang zla ba phyed nyi ma'i mdun du rgyu ba na rim par rgyu ba dang zla ba phyed nyi ma'i rgyab tu ni 'khyog po'i gza'o //
translated: But when the moon moves in front of the sun for half a month, it is a direct eclipse. When the moon moves behind the sun for half a month, it is an oblique eclipse.

original: zla ba gcig du ba med la /
analyzed: zla ba gcig du ba med la /
translated: For one month there is no smoke.

original: de nas mthar zla ba phyed du ba dang bcas pa'o //🔽zla ba phyed dang gnyis su 'char ba de'i tshe zla ba sum cu rtsa bdun gnyis kyis bsgyur bas /
analyzed: de nas mthar zla ba phyed du ba dang bcas pa'o // zla ba phyed dang gnyis su 'char ba de'i tshe zla ba sum cu rtsa bdun gnyis kyis bsgyur bas /
translated: Then finally for half a month there is smoke.🔽When the moon rises for one and a half months, it rises in the east and west, etc., by the division of thirty-seven and a half.

original: shar dang nub la sogs pa'i dbye bas 'char te zla ba sum cu rtsa bdun ni shar du 'char ro //
analyzed: shar dang nub la sogs pa'i dbye bas 'char te zla ba sum cu rtsa bdun ni shar du 'char ro //
translated: Thirty-seven and a half rise in the east.

original: sum cu rtsa bdun ni nub tu 'char ro //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa bdun ni nub tu 'char ro //
translated: Thirty-seven and a half rise in the west.

original: de nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs te gnas so //
analyzed: de nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs te gnas so //
translated: Then they enter and remain in the orb of the sun.

original: de'i tshe yang nyi ma dang mnyam par 'jug pas de'i rkang pa rnams tha dad par ma bshad de /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang nyi ma dang mnyam par 'jug pas de'i rkang pa rnams tha dad par ma bshad de /
translated: At that time, because they move in conjunction with the sun, their feet are not explained separately.

original: nyi ma'i rkang pa'i gnas rnams kho na de'i yin no //
analyzed: nyi ma'i rkang pa'i gnas rnams kho na de'i yin no //
translated: The abodes of the sun’s feet are their abodes.

original: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsis kyi gzhung 'grel nyung du 'di dpal stag lung thang gi gtsug lag khang du /
analyzed: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsis kyi gzhung 'grel nyung du 'di dpal stag lung thang gi gtsug lag khang du /
translated: This commentary on the text of astrology of the glorious Kālacakra, which is brief, was written at the glorious monastery of Taklung Thang.

original: chos kyi rje rin po che thams cad mkhyen pa dpal ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyi phyag dpe las chos rje rin po che bi dza ya k'irti shr'i bha dra'i zhal snga nas bsgyur cig ces bka' stsal pa bzhin legs par
analyzed: chos kyi rje rin po che thams cad mkhyen pa dpal ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyi phyag dpe las chos rje rin po che bi dza ya k'irti shr'i bha dra'i zhal snga nas bsgyur cig ces bka' stsal pa bzhin legs par
translated: In accordance with the command of the lord of Dharma, the precious omniscient one, the glorious Ngawang Chokden, who said, “Translate this from the text of the precious lord of Dharma Vijayakīrti Śrī Bhadra,”🔽I, the translator from Zhalu, the monk Chökyong Zangpo, who has a mere knowledge of a portion of the treatises of grammar, translated this well in the language of India.

original: sbyar ba'i skad kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos dag gi cha shas tsam rig pa zha lu lo ts'a ba dge slong chos skyong bzang pos rang lo zhe lnga pa zil gnon gyi lo dgun zla 'bring po'i tshes nyer gcig la rdzogs par bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: sbyar ba'i skad kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos dag gi cha shas tsam rig pa zha lu lo ts'a ba dge slong chos skyong bzang pos rang lo zhe lnga pa zil gnon gyi lo dgun zla 'bring po'i tshes nyer gcig la rdzogs par bsgyur ba'o//
translated: I completed this in my forty-fifth year, the year of the monkey, on the twenty-first day of the middle winter month.

analyzed: (// mgon dam pa 'di nyid kyi zhabs rdul spyi bor len pa sh'akya'i bande s'a nanda lakshmis rtsis kyi gtsug lag phyogs tsam rig pa la brten rang gi lag bris su bgyis pa'i dge bas kun mkhyen thob phar shog/)// gzhung 'di bsgyur las thob pa'i legs byas kyis
translated: By the virtue obtained from translating this text,🔽may the excellent crown ornament of all beings,

original: / dbyig 'dzin gzhi la lhar bcas skye dgu yi //🔽gtsug rgyan dam pa sh'akya'i bstan pa rnams //
analyzed: / dbyig 'dzin gzhi la lhar bcas skye dgu yi // gtsug rgyan dam pa sh'akya'i bstan pa rnams //
translated: including the gods, on the face of the earth,

original: dar zhing rgyas la yun ring gnas gyur cig //
analyzed: dar zhing rgyas la yun ring gnas gyur cig //
translated: the teachings of the Śākya, spread and remain for a long time.
